name: Arabian Buttered Eggs with Mint and Lemon
desp: Traditional Arabian recipes served with homemade staples like labneh, nabulsi cheese, jams, zaatar, dukka, and olive oil.

name: Masoub, a Saudi Arabian Banana Breakfast
desp: Popular Masoub Saudi breakfast recipe, a banana dish, favorite Arabic breakfast.

name: Shakshuka; A delicious Middle Eastern Egg Dish
desp: Eggs poached in tomato sauce with onions and bell peppers, a traditional Arabian breakfast.

name: Arabian Foul
desp: Hummus, boiled eggs with zaatar, spicy Foul, and labneh yogurt cheese.

name: Saudi Jareesh Recipe
desp: Jareesh, a popular dish with crushed wheat, yogurt, and meat from Saudi Arabia.

name: Burnt Leek & Caper Berry
desp: Rich, roasted leeks with caper berry flavor and fresh dipping veggies.

name: Arabian Falafel Recipe
desp: Deep-fried balls or patties, a popular snack in the Middle East.

name: Al Kabsa
desp: Traditional Arabian rice dish made with chicken, sometimes lamb.

name: Arabian Chicken Mandi Recipe - Yemeni Style Rice & Chicken
desp: Chicken Mandi with mandi powder over basmati rice, a traditional Arabian recipe.

name: Chicken Machboos
desp: Popular rice dish from the Arabian Gulf made with lamb or chicken.

name: Chicken Shawarma
desp: Traditional Arabian recipe for delicious chicken shawarma.

name: Saffron Fish and Rice with Tahini and Toasted Nuts
desp: Fish and rice cooked separately, arranged in a platter for consistency.

name: Arabian Lamb Stew
desp: Loaded with tender lamb and earthy, warm Arabian spices.

name: Arabian Chicken Stew
desp: Tender chicken, potatoes, carrots with earthy spices like cumin and coriander.

name: Arabic Lentil Soup
desp: Made with vegetables and lentils, simmered with cinnamon and cumin.
